Articles.Content:
I just got a Nvidia Geforce GTX 550 TI for my computer. (Barely fit in my case :-[)

Now i am getting a solid 60 FPS in the VAB at ALL times.

Getting solid 60 FPS in flight. (30 FPS with SUPER DUPER MASSIVE ROCKETS)

If you need a fast Graphics card I recommend the Nvidia Geforce GTX 550 TI.

I am actually about to build myself a new computer (have some parts still waiting on others to arrive) and I am going for the GTX 570...

I am eager to see what it will be capable of

Videocard: Geforce GTX 570

CPU: i5-2500k 3.3GHz quad core

Memory: Corsair 8 GB DDR 3 1600 RAM

Boot/Main Hard Drive: OCZ Vertex 4 128 GB SSD
Kurtjmac uses a 570 TI. Just a little F.Y.I.
Nice. I am about to build myself a computer that runs 2 GTX550TI\'s in SLI. The performance is similar to a GTX570 but (in Australia at least) is over $100 cheaper.
